subject: FBR Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: During Thursday’s opening round of the FBR Open at the T.P.C. Scottsdale, a record crowd of 83,657 topping the capacity of the 73,000-seat University of Phoenix Stadium, the site of Sunday’s Super Bowl.
snippet: During Thursday’s opening round of the FBR Open at the T.P.C. Scottsdale, a record crowd of 83,657 topping the capacity of the 73,000-seat University of Phoenix Stadium, the site of Sunday’s Super Bowl.
